summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Resume Tailor platform. Backend APIs fully functional (10/10 tests passed). Frontend core flows working: landing page, registration, login, dashboard. Minor navigation issues identified in dashboard quick actions.

ui_bugs.issue: Navigation buttons timeout when clicking to other pages

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all UI elements
Resume, job-portals, applications, emails, reports endpoints accessible
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dashboard navigation: Quick action buttons for 'Browse Jobs' and 'View Reports' are not navigating properly. Check routing and button click handlers in DashboardPage.jsx.
